name: Derived default status derivation rule
description: This derivation rule aims to obtain the Derived default status from its building blocks.
algorithm:
SET DFLT_STTS_DRVD = 
      CASE
        WHEN /*INSTRMNT.*/DFLT_STTS IN (18, 19, 20)
        OR /*PRTY.*/DFLT_STTS IN (18, 19, 20)
        THEN 6
        ELSE 14
      END;

logical_transformation_rule.algorithm:
